description:
"Bottoming is a little more relaxing," Kurt said as he was sitting next to Mitch. He's done both and it seems he's taken a liking to being the "catcher!"

I kind of think that Mitch likes getting fucked too. So the guys decided they were going to take turns doing each other.

"Whatever he does to me I'm going to do to him!" Mitch said with a smile.

That seemed just fine with Kurt!
title: Kurt & Mitch
